sponsor: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
briefTitle: Open Label Safety Study of Enteric-Coated Spheroid Suspension in Infants Aged Less Than 12 Months With Presumed Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
officialTitle: A Muliticenter, Open Label Safety Study of 2 Doses of Pantoprazole Sodium Enteric-Coated Spheroid Suspension in Infants Aged Less Than 12 Months With Presumed GERD
summary: The purpose of this study is to provide additional information on safety and tolerability after multiple does of pantoprazole. Only patients who successfully completed the 3001B3-331 study (NCT00362609) or 3001B3-333 study (NCT00259012) are eligible to participate in this study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Laboratory Test Values of Potential Clinical Importance During Treatment Period
